partitions.name: Dim_ITEM_SITE_EXTRACT_MANUFACTURER
partitions.expression:
let
                Source = Sql.Database("REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_SERVER", "REPLACE_WITH_YOUR_DATABASE"),
                Query = Value.NativeQuery(
                    Source,
                    "SELECT DISTINCT [ITEM_NUMBER], [ITEM_NUMBER] as [ITEM_NUMBER_Key] FROM (SELECT [ITEM_NUMBER] FROM [ITEM_SITE_EXTRACT] UNION ALL SELECT [ITEM_NUMBER] FROM [MANUFACTURER]) AS CombinedKeys WHERE [ITEM_NUMBER] IS NOT NULL AND [ITEM_NUMBER] <> ''''''",
                    null, 
                    [EnableFolding = true]
                )
                in
                Query
